citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on July
18, 2022. Inspector knocked on doors and spoke with licensee who stated that he was currently on the road and not
available today.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on July 
18, 2022. Inspector knocked on doors and spoke with licensee who stated that he was currently on the road and not 
available today. 
 
 
 
End Section
